thread.title: Masters hopeful Grayson Murray taps up glamour model Lindsey Pelas to be his caddie - and she agrees!
thread.title_full: Masters hopeful Grayson Murray taps up glamour model Lindsey Pelas to be his caddie - and she agrees!

author: Marc Isaacs
title: Masters hopeful Grayson Murray taps up glamour model Lindsey Pelas to be his caddie - and she agrees!
text:
Pelas could be one of the main attractions at Augusta (Photo: Getty Images / Lindsey Pelas / Instagram) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Masters hopeful Grayson Murray has tapped up glamour model Lindsey Pelas to be his caddie at the showpiece event at Augusta at the start of April. 
Murray has been struggling on the PGA Tour to qualify for the tournament BUT his luck might be about to change! 
You cannot fault the ambition of the rookie 23-year-old who must have thought he had no chance when he tweeted the blonde bombshell and asked if she would be his caddie if he qualified for the Masters Tournament which gets underway on April 6. The Playboy model has six million followers on Instagram (Photo: Getty Images) 
Much to his surprise and probably anyone who followed him, the Playboy beauty agreed. 
The pressure is now on as his poor performances at the last five tournaments have basically put him in an all or nothing position. 
Murray needs to win the Houston Open at the end of March to land a spot at Augusta but he has now got all the motivation he needs to qualify and few could blame him. Murray could not believe his luck when Pelas agreed to his request (Photo: Getty Images) 
Pelas, who has six million Instagram followers, is regarded as one of the sexiest social media stars and a number of sporting stars have tried and failed in their attempts to meet up with the model. 
Cricket legend Shane Warne offered his support in the form of social media likes while Calum Best, son of football legend George, has also been in a relationship with the 25-year-old. Instagram Murray has to win the Houston Open to stand any chance of Pelas appearing alongside him (Photo: Getty Images) 
All eyes are now on Murray to see if he can qualify for the Masters and have a Playboy model to accompany him around the course. 
The golfing fans will certainly hope that can be the case! poll loading Who will win The Masters' green jacket this year? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
